verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be an apostle, <S%G652><s%> set apart <S%G873><s%> for the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
which <S%G3739><s%> he promised before <S%G4279><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%>

concerning <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was born <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%>

who was declared <S%G3724><s%> to be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of holiness, <S%G42><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> Jesus Christ our Lord,

through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we received <S%G2983><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> apostleship, <S%G651><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>'s sake;
among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to belong to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

to all <S%G3956><s%> who are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints: <S%G40><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

First, <S%G4412><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is proclaimed <S%G2605><s%> throughout <S%G1722><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I serve <S%G3000><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> unceasingly <S%G89><s%> I make <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you always in my prayers, <S%G5216><s%>

requesting, <S%G1189><s%> if by any means <S%G1513><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at last <S%G4218><s%> I may be prospered <S%G2137><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I long <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may impart <S%G3330><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> gift, <S%G5486><s%> to the end <S%G1519><s%> that you <S%G5209><s%> may be established; <S%G4741><s%>

that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> that I with <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> may be encouraged <S%G4837><s%> in you, <S%G1223><s%> each of us by the other <S%G240><s%>'s faith, <S%G4102><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> yours <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> mine. <S%G1700><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> to have <S%G50><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unaware, <S%G80><s%> brothers, that <S%G3754><s%> I often <S%G4178><s%> planned <S%G4388><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was hindered <S%G2967><s%> so far, <S%G1204><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I might have <S%G2192><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> debtor <S%G3781><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to Greeks <S%G1672><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> to foreigners, <S%G915><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to the wise <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> to the foolish. <S%G453><s%>

So, <S%G3779><s%> as much as <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2596><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> I am eager to preach the Good News <S%G2097><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> who are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Rome. <S%G4516><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> for everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> believes; <S%G4100><s%> for the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> is <S%G601><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s righteousness <S%G1343><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "But the righteous <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>"

For <S%G1063><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is revealed <S%G601><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> suppress <S%G2722><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%>

because <S%G1360><s%> that which is known <S%G1110><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> revealed <S%G5318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> revealed <S%G5318><s%> it to them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the invisible things <S%G517><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the creation <S%G2937><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> are clearly seen, <S%G2529><s%> being perceived <S%G3539><s%> through the things that are made, <S%G4161><s%> even <S%G5037><s%> his <S%G846><s%> everlasting <S%G126><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> divinity; <S%G2305><s%> that <S%G1519><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may be <S%G1511><s%> without excuse. <S%G379><s%>

Because, <S%G1360><s%> knowing <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> they didn't <S%G3756><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> him as <S%G5613><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> neither <S%G2228><s%> gave thanks, <S%G2168><s%> but <S%G235><s%> became vain <S%G3154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> reasoning, <S%G1261><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> senseless <S%G801><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> was darkened. <S%G4654><s%>
Professing themselves <S%G5335><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> wise, <S%G4680><s%> they became fools, <S%G3471><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> traded <S%G236><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the incorruptible <S%G862><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> the likeness of an image <S%G1504><s%> of <S%G3667><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of birds, <S%G4071><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> four-footed <S%G5074><s%> animals, and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things. <S%G2062><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> that their <S%G846><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> should be dishonored <S%G818><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%>

who <S%G3748><s%> exchanged <S%G3337><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> a lie, <S%G5579><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4573><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> served <S%G3000><s%> the creature <S%G2937><s%> rather than <S%G3844><s%> the Creator, <S%G2936><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> reason, <S%G1223><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> vile <S%G819><s%> passions. <S%G3806><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G99999><s%> their <S%G846><s%> women <S%G2338><s%> changed <S%G3337><s%> the natural <S%G5446><s%> function <S%G5540><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> against <S%G3844><s%> nature. <S%G5449><s%>

<S%G5037><s%> Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the men, <S%G730><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> the natural <S%G5446><s%> function <S%G5540><s%> of the woman, <S%G2338><s%> burned <S%G1572><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lust <S%G3715><s%> toward one another, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G240><s%> men <S%G730><s%> doing <S%G2716><s%> what is inappropriate <S%G808><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> men, <S%G730><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receiving <S%G618><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> due <S%G1163><s%> penalty <S%G489><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> error. <S%G4106><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> they <S%G1381><s%> <S%G3756><s%> refused <S%G1381><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their knowledge, <S%G1922><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> a reprobate <S%G96><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> those things <S%G3588><s%> which are <S%G2520><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> fitting; <S%G2520><s%>

being filled with <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> sexual immorality, <S%G4202><s%> wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> malice; <S%G2549><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of envy, <S%G5355><s%> murder, <S%G5408><s%> strife, <S%G2054><s%> deceit, <S%G1388><s%> evil habits, <S%G2550><s%> secret slanderers, <S%G5588><s%>

backbiters, <S%G2637><s%> hateful to God, <S%G2319><s%> insolent, <S%G5197><s%> haughty, <S%G5244><s%> boastful, <S%G213><s%> inventors <S%G2182><s%> of evil things, <S%G2556><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents, <S%G1118><s%>
without understanding, <S%G801><s%> covenant breakers, <S%G802><s%> without natural affection, <S%G794><s%> unforgiving, <S%G786><s%> unmerciful; <S%G415><s%>

who, <S%G3748><s%> knowing <S%G1921><s%> the ordinance <S%G1345><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> practice <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> approve <S%G4909><s%> of those who <S%G3588><s%> practice them. <S%G4238><s%>
